Madea's Witness Protection

Ano: 2012

IMDb ID: tt2215285

Classificação: 5

Sinopse: George heads to the Wall Street office on a Saturday only to find out that his division is actually a Ponzi scheme just revealed by CNN. He was promoted to CFO to take the fall one day. To make matters worse, a mob family has used his division to launder money. SEC/FBI is on to the company and George is the only one left. The usual safe houses aren't safe enough so the agent in charge flies George and his family to Georgia to stay with his weird aunt Madea until the trial two months later.—Scott Filtenborg
